name: Petrichor
description: What is human destiny? How can our deeds can affect our destiny? What if I told you that you could live your life in many different ways?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated or higher DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated or higher
